Title: Too Many Cooks
Writer: Casper Kelly, Jim Fortier (creative consultant), Nick Gibbons (creative consultant), Paul Painter (creative consultant), Dave Willis (creative consultant)
Actors: Ken DeLozier, Tara Ochs, Katelyn Nacon, Justin Scott
Plot: Too Many Cooks is a dark comedy short that originally aired as a special during Adult Swim's "infomercials" block on October 28, 2014, at 4:00 am Eastern Time. It is ostensibly the intro credits of a TV show named "Too Many Cooks", but devolves into a meta-exploration of different TV genres with an ongoing plot line involving a killer attempting to infiltrate the show.
